value.title: Vietnam's Timo Bank Builds with AWS to Promote Financial Inclusion
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services (AWS), an Amazon.com company, today announced that Timo, Vietnam's leading digital bank, has built and launched its cloud native core banking platform on AWS in just six months. The cloud banking platform will help Timo scale its business and acquire 5 million new customers over the next three years.

value.title: AWS to invest Rs 36,000 crore for new Hyderabad region service
value.excerpt: HYDERABAD: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is planning to invest an estimated $4.4 billion (Rs 36,300 crore) in India by 2030 through the new AWS Asia Pacific (Hyderabad) Region. The construction and operation of the AWS Asia Pacific (Hyderabad) Region is estimated to add approximately $7.6 billion to India’s gross domestic product (GDP) by 2030.
